pkgmetadata.longdescription: The bbrl_gymnasium library is the place where I put additional gym-like environments.So far, it contains the following environments:- CartPoleContinuous-v0 (with timit limit = 200 steps)- CartPoleContinuous-v1 (with timit limit = 500 steps)- MazeMDP, a Maze environment for Tabular RL- RocketLander-v0, a rocket landing simulation adapted from [this repository](https://github.com/sdsubhajitdas/Rocket_Lander_Gym)- LineMDP-v0, a simple discrete state and action MDP- LineMDPContinuous-v0, a simple discrete action MDP- 2DMDPContinuous-v0, a discrete action MDP with 2D state## Installation```pip install bbrl_gymnasium```## Use it```import gymnasium as gymimport bbrl_gymnasiumenv = gym.make("CartPoleContinuous-v0") # or -v1 or any other and then use your environment as usual```
